row.entry: Do not repeat on related LinguisticObject of VisualItem.
Do not repeat on containing Set.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: DigitalObjectAsset sampleBibs: - 358058 fieldSpec: - 856|4*|uy - mfhd856uyz trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: NONE

step.cmd: Process 856 links in both bib and MFHD records.
Output a DigitalObject link to a related digital asset using the URI recorded in 856u.
If 856y is present, add it to the embedded reference using identified_by.
If 856z is present, add it to the embedded reference using referred_to_by.
If 856|40| and the record-level resource is a DigitalObject:
